name: Thror
response: Thror is a troll who spends much of his time in caves, grumbling about minor annoyances. While he has little passion for insurance, he holds pharmaceutical companies in the highest regard, even going so far as to write love letters to them in slime on cave walls. When it comes to crypto, Thror is indifferent—acknowledging its existence but not particularly passionate about it, often muttering that digital gold pales in comparison to mossy shrines.
